assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Indus Towers Limited provides telecom tower infrastructure sharing services. The company acquires, builds, deploys, owns, operates, and manages telecom towers and communication structures for various mobile operators. As of March 31, 2020, it owned and operated 42,053 towers with 75,715 co-locations in 11 telecommunications circles in India. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India. Indus Towers Limited is a subsidiary of Bharti Airtel Limited.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Rajiv  Arora
companyOfficers.title: Chief of Legal, Regulatory & Corp. Affairs
